content.rendered:
New Walls of Books in Athens, Georgia!

Opening September 2015

Kids Corner Week 8

Join us this coming week for a jungle safari! Visit us on Wednesdays in Macon at 10:00 a.m. and on Thursdays in Warner Robins at 10:00 a.m.

  • Find Our Locations 
  • View the Complete Kids Corner Schedule

Summer Reading

Make the most of the summer. Be sure to visit us for your school’s summer reading requirements… or grab a couple of novels to take on vacation!

excerpt.rendered: A new Walls of Books opens September 2015 in Athens, GA!
